title: FM24 Challenge Creator
generate_button_label: Say goodbye to your social life

info_section.title: How It Works
info_section.description: Welcome to FM24 Challenge Creator! This webapp allows you to generate random challenges for Football Manager 2024. Here's how it works:
info_section.difficulty_description: Select the difficulty level of the league. This determines which teams can be selected for your challenge - from the most prestigious to the most obscure.
info_section.challenge_difficulty_description: Choose how challenging you want the specific challenges to be. From simple objectives to almost impossible missions!
info_section.conclusion: Once you've selected these parameters, click "Generate Challenge" and the system will propose a random team with three challenges to complete: one for the squad, one tactical, and one seasonal objective. You can generate as many challenges as you want until you find the perfect one for you!

cookie_banner.title: Cookie Policy
cookie_banner.description: This website uses cookies to improve your browsing experience and collect information about site usage. We use Google Analytics to analyze traffic. You can accept all cookies or customize your preferences.

footer-text: Inspired by Football Manager 2024 | Developed with love and anger by

errors.check_paths: Check that the JSON file paths are correct.
errors.not_enough_challenges: There aren't enough challenges for the selected difficulty level. Try selecting "All".
